#include <stdio.h>
#define g getchar_unlocked
long long a[87]={0LL,1LL, 2LL, 4LL, 7LL, 12LL, 20LL, 33LL, 54LL, 88LL, 143LL, 232LL, 376LL, 609LL, 986LL, 1596LL, 2583LL, 4180LL, 6764LL, 10945LL, 17710LL, 28656LL, 46367LL, 75024LL, 121392LL, 196417LL, 317810LL, 514228LL, 832039LL, 1346268LL, 2178308LL, 3524577LL, 5702886LL, 9227464LL, 14930351LL, 24157816LL, 39088168LL, 63245985LL, 102334154LL, 165580140LL, 267914295LL, 433494436LL, 701408732LL, 1134903169LL, 1836311902LL, 2971215072LL, 4807526975LL, 7778742048LL, 12586269024LL, 20365011073LL, 32951280098LL, 53316291172LL, 86267571271LL, 139583862444LL, 225851433716LL, 365435296161LL, 591286729878LL, 956722026040LL, 1548008755919LL, 2504730781960LL, 4052739537880LL, 6557470319841LL, 10610209857722LL, 17167680177564LL, 27777890035287LL, 44945570212852LL, 72723460248140LL, 117669030460993LL, 190392490709134LL, 308061521170128LL, 498454011879263LL, 806515533049392LL, 1304969544928656LL, 2111485077978049LL, 3416454622906706LL, 5527939700884756LL, 8944394323791463LL, 14472334024676220LL, 23416728348467684LL, 37889062373143905LL, 61305790721611590LL, 99194853094755496LL, 160500643816367087LL, 259695496911122584LL, 420196140727489672LL, 679891637638612257LL, 1100087778366101930LL};
inline long long rd()
{
    long long  x=0;
    char c;
    while(((c=g())<'0'||c>'9'));
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+c-48,c=g();
    return x;
}
 
int main()
{
	long long t,i,n;
	t=rd();
	while(t--)
	{
		n=rd();
		i=1;
        while(1)
        {
        	if(a[i]<n)
        		i++;
        	else break;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",i);
	}
	return 0;
}
